name: Roguevive: Prelude
description:
Roguevive Prelude Is an online coop roguelite Bullet Heaven.
Choose your weapon to face the deadly horde of enemies and bosses.
Level up and collect gold to get ever stronger.
Play alone or up to 3 other friends.

Feature of the prelude

  • Meta Progression
  • 5 starting weapons
  • 30+ Upgrades
  • 15+ meta progression upgrades
  • Online Multiplayer up to 4 players
  • 2 Stages
  • 3+ bosses
  • 15+ enemies to face
